mapper.select: select * from pbs where showData="Y" order by id desc;

mapper.insert: insert into pbs(book, chapter, startVerse, endVerse, content, userName, userId, date, showData) values ( #{pbs.book}, #{pbs.chapter}, #{pbs.startVerse}, #{pbs.endVerse}, #{pbs.content}, #{pbs.userName}, #{pbs.userId}, #{pbs.date}, #{pbs.showData} );
mapper.update: update pbs set book = #{pbs.book}, chapter = #{pbs.chapter}, startVerse = #{pbs.startVerse}, endVerse = #{pbs.endVerse}, content = #{pbs.content}, date = #{pbs.date}, showData = #{pbs.showData} where id = #{pbs.id};
